description: This file is an HTML document that defines the user interface for a database visualizer web application, including styles, structure, and client-side JavaScript for data loading and interaction.
external_methods: fetchData (fetch API calls for data retrieval)

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads list of databases from backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets current selections, and updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entries to show/hide tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them in the UI.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data with support for wide and object content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full view or truncation.
